body_html:
The way I get this error is when following the tutorial TensorFlow for poets 2.

I first tried the TensorFlow for poets (https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets/index.html?index=..%2F..%2Findex#0) to retrain a model with my data (this part works just fine even when using the retrained .pb graph on android but the detection time is still slow and the battery usage high).

I wanted to try and implement TFLite to help fix these problems, so I followed the tutorial TensorFlow for poets 2 (https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets-2-tflite/#0) to convert my .pb model into a .tflite model. The output model is the one that causes the java.lang.NullPointerException: Internal error: Cannot allocate memory for the interpreter when imported in Android, but the inceptionv3_slim_2016.tflite works fine, it just does not work with my retrained model.

I'm running this on Samsung Galaxy S6 running Android 7.0 by the way, I hope this gives you more information on how to reproduce the problem.

The output model is the one that causes the java.lang.NullPointerException: Internal error: Cannot allocate memory for the interpreter when imported in Android, but the inceptionv3_slim_2016.tflite works fine, it just does not work with my retrained model.
I'm running this on Samsung Galaxy S6 running Android 7.0 by the way, I hope this gives you more information on how to reproduce the problem.
body:
The way I get this error is when following the tutorial TensorFlow for poets 2.

I first tried the TensorFlow for poets (https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets/index.html?index=..%2F..%2Findex#0) to retrain a model with my data (this part works just fine even when using the retrained .pb graph on android but the detection time is still slow and the battery usage high).

I wanted to try and implement TFLite to help fix these problems, so I followed the tutorial TensorFlow for poets 2 (https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets-2-tflite/#0) to convert my .pb model into a .tflite model. The output model is the one that causes the java.lang.NullPointerException: Internal error: Cannot allocate memory for the interpreter when imported in Android, but the inceptionv3_slim_2016.tflite works fine, it just does not work with my retrained model.

I'm running this on Samsung Galaxy S6 running Android 7.0 by the way, I hope this gives you more information on how to reproduce the problem.
